text: George Smith (born 20 May 1901) was a Scottish-born footballer who played as a right back in the Football League in the 1920s. Born in Glasgow, he joined Notts County from Strathclyde FC, and made his first league appearance for them in 1924–25. Smith went on to play 83 league games for County, with his last coming in 1927–28. Smith then moved on to West Ham United, but he did not play in a senior game for them. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Footballers from Glasgow Category:Association football defenders Category:English Football League players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:West Ham United F.C. players Category:Scottish footballers
title: George Smith (footballer, born May 1901)
